# imagePickerControllerDidCancel(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate that the user canceled the pick operation.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func imagePickerControllerDidCancel(_ picker: UIImagePickerController)
```

## Parameters

- **picker**: The controller object managing the image picker interface.

## Discussion

Your delegate’s implementation of this method should dismiss the picker view by calling the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewController/dismiss(animated:completion:)] method of the parent view controller.

Implementation of this method is optional, but expected.

## Closing the picker

- **imagePickerController(_:didFinishPickingMediaWithInfo:)**: Tells the delegate that the user picked a still image or movie.
